title: Love Island's Curtis Pritchard and Molly-Mae Hague join Kerry Katona for Shocktober Fest
text:
Kerry Katona, Molly-Mae Hague, and Curtis Pritchard are out for spooks (Picture: Grant Buchanan/SplashNews)

Love Island stars Curtis Pritchard and Molly-Mae Hague turned out for Tulley’s Shocktober Fest, alongside a number of reality stars.

Molly-Mae Hague, who was runner-up on this year’s Love Island alongside Tommy Fury, was seen surrounded by spooky clowns at the press night event at Tulley’s Farm, Crawley, Sussex.

Also at the event was Love Island co-star Curtis Pritchard, although he was seen without partner Maura Higgins.

Molly-Mae Hague rides with some clowns at Shocktoberfest (Picture: Grant Buchanan/Splash News)

Curtis Pritchard is down for some spooks (Picture: Grant Buchanan/Splash News)

Kerry Katona was at the Halloween themed event all wrapped up, and was later pictured with boyfriend Ryan Mahoney and her children, minus eldest daughter Molly.

Kerry has daughters, Molly, 17, and Lilly-Sue, 16, with first husband Brian McFadden, shares Heidi, 12, and Maxwell, 11, with Mark Croft, and Dylan-Jorge, five, with late third husband George.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Other attendees included Rag N Bone Man, Gypsies Next Door’s Danielle Mason, Aisleyne Horgan-Wallace from Big Brother fame, and Shane Richie.

You can check out more pictures from the bash below.

Kerry Katona at Shocktoberfest (Picture: Splash News)

Rag N Bone Man at Shocktober fest (Picture: Splash News)

Lauryn Goodman also arrives (Picture: SplashNews)

Shane Ritchie was also at the bash (Picture: SplashNews)

Jess Impiazzi also appeared at the event (Picture: Splash News)

description: The reality stars were out in force for the bash.
